Posts.Content: Peblos20 wrote: Hello. Has anyone used estring? Has it worked for you? I needed something for vaginal atrophy and just started it. Have gained some weight in just 5 days and am extremely moody. Please let me know if it helped you or made things worse. Thank you. Posts.Title: Estring anyone? Peblos20 Peblos20

Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2015 02:15PM Peblos20 wrote: Hi Iamstronger. I saw your post and could not believe you too could smell that weird sweet smell. I just had a bilateral mastectomy in Nov 2014 and have the expanders with saline in and reconstruction is set for April 2015 and noticed that smell soon after the surgery. I just thought it might be the expanders that for some weird way I could smell. Its kind of hard to describe the smell but it sort of smells like a new kids doll plastic kind of smell. It doesn't smell bad but its too weird. I had chemo from June to September 2014 and am currently on herceptin and perjetta. Was googling all over the place trying to find an answer to this and I found your post. I hope I can finally solve this mystery. Have a great day!
Posts.Title: Sweet smell Iamstronger Tomboy

Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2015 10:02PM Peblos20 wrote: Hello Iamstronger. My mets were in spine and ribs. I'm now in remission. Funny thing is the smell can be really strong some days but it is always there...its not a sinus infection either. I was on tamoxifen in 2013 but just on herceptin/perjetta right now. Is the smell sort of the way I described it? It is hard to describe but to me it is like a new plastic doll smell. Weird. Take care.
Posts.Title: Sweet smell Iamstronger Tomboy
